statements: SELECT * FROM course_materials ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT material_title, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT material_id, material_title, material_content FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'lecture' ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT material_id, material_title FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND material_type = 'video';
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM course_materials GROUP BY course_id HAVING total_materials > 3;
SELECT material_id, material_title, material_content FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 'd77e1ff2-9880-4cd8-b38d-806437131511';
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT course_id, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE material_title LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT material_id, material_title, created_at FROM course_materials WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM course_materials ORDER BY material_title ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM lectures WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_id = 3;
SELECT lecture_title, course_id FROM lectures ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE lecture_id = 2;
SELECT material_type, material_url FROM course_materials ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT lecture_title, course_id FROM lectures WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;

SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date FROM lectures JOIN course_materials ON lectures.lecture_id = course_materials.lecture_id WHERE lectures.course_id = 101 AND course_materials.material_type = 'slides' ORDER BY lecture_date ASC;
SELECT lecture_title, material_type, material_url FROM lectures JOIN course_materials ON lectures.lecture_id = course_materials.lecture_id WHERE lectures.course_id = 202 ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT lecture_id, lecture_title, course_id, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE course_id IN (101, 202) ORDER BY lecture_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_description FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_id, lecture_title, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT video_title, video_description FROM videos WHERE lecture_id = '0870b1bb-f5cb-4da7-b33e-2b1c5f69fd42';
SELECT slide_title, slide_content FROM slides ORDER BY slide_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT slide_title, slide_content, lectures.lecture_title FROM slides JOIN lectures ON slides.lecture_id = lectures.lecture_id;
SELECT video_title, video_description FROM videos ORDER BY video_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM lectures WHERE lecture_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_description FROM lectures ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM slides WHERE lecture_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students;
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date FROM lectures ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_description FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lecture_title, slide_title, slide_content FROM lectures JOIN slides ON lectures.lecture_id = slides.lecture_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM Lectures;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_topic FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT lecture_id, lecture_name, lecture_topic FROM Lectures ORDER BY lecture_id DESC;
SELECT lecture_name, slide_name, slide_url FROM Lectures JOIN Slides ON Lectures.lecture_id = Slides.lecture_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM StudentCourses WHERE course_id = 1);
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_topic FROM Lectures;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lecture_name, slide_name, slide_url FROM Lectures JOIN Slides ON Lectures.lecture_id = Slides.lecture_id;
SELECT lecture_name, video_title, video_url FROM Lectures JOIN Videos ON Lectures.lecture_id = Videos.lecture_id WHERE Videos.video_title LIKE '%Introduction%';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students JOIN StudentCourses ON Students.student_id = StudentCourses.student_id WHERE StudentCourses.course_id = 1;
